note: To allow for comparisons between countries and over time, the metrics are [age-standardized](#dod:age_standardized). All deaths in a country may not have been registered with a [cause of death](#dod:underlying-cause-of-death).
title: Lung cancer death rate in men vs. women
subtitle: The reported annual death rate from lung [cancer](#dod:cancer) per 100,000 people in men versus women, based on the [underlying cause](#dod:underlying-cause-of-death) listed on death certificates.
